message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm asking for $9,500. I think you'll find this to be a fair price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $7,500 is quite a bit below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $8,750?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I can offer $8,000. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any higher.
